_purpose: AI behavior guidelines - how AI should work on this project

items.title: Component Structure
items.description: Each component has a single [name].scss file with: reset styles, base styles, and style variants using @include style(1/2/3). Use design tokens directly from tokens.scss - no component-specific variables.

items.title: Web Components
items.description: Web components use Lit. They enhance native elements, not replace them. CSS works without JS, components add interactivity.

items.title: Token Naming
items.description: Use tree-level suffixes for gap/radius: --gap-shell, --gap-primitive, --gap-component (same for --radius-*). Use 1-2-3 suffixes for scale tokens: --space-1/2/3, --width-1/2/3, --z-index-1/2/3. Never use semantic names like --button-bg.

items.title: Prefer grid over flex
items.description: Always prefer CSS Grid over Flexbox for layouts. Grid is more powerful and predictable for 2D layouts.

items.title: No margin on elements
items.description: Never add margin to component elements. Use gap on parent containers (grid/flex) for spacing instead.

items.title: Workspace Structure
items.description: Project has two packages: lib/ (design system - CSS tokens, components, web components) and frontend/ (Svelte 5 docs app). Frontend imports lib via relative paths (../../lib/dist/). Icons are copied to frontend/public/icons/ for Vite serving.

items.title: Frontend Development
items.description: Run 'npm run dev' in frontend/ folder. Uses Vite + Svelte 5 with runes (, , ). Import lib CSS via @import '../../lib/dist/core.css' and JS via import '../../lib/dist/core.js'. Configure nuke-icon basePath to '/icons'.

items.title: Token Overrides
items.description: Frontend can override lib tokens in style.css. Create aliases for compatibility (--on-background â†’ --color-text-1) and override colors for app-specific theming. Both dark-theme and light-theme classes supported.

items.title: SCSS Component Pattern
items.description: Components use SCSS: @use '../mixins' as *; then use element variables ($btn, $input) and @include style(1/2/3) { } for variants. This replaces verbose CSS selectors with readable mixin calls.

items.title: Gap/Radius Token Usage
items.description: Use tokens matching folder level: 1-app-shell uses --gap-shell/--radius-shell, 2-primitives uses --gap-primitive/--radius-primitive, 3-components uses --gap-component/--radius-component. This enables per-level customization while cascading from base --gap and --radius values.
